subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Wrigley Field is going to be the frozen confines on New Year’s Day 2009, when the defending Stanley Cup champion Detroit Red Wings meet the Chicago Blackhawks outdoors in the home park of the Chicago Cubs. It will be the N.H.L.’s second Winter Classic. Commissioner Gary Bettman said the league would continue discussions with the Yankees and New York City about bringing an outdoor game to the new Yankee Stadium.
